product_name: Seirus SoundTouch Hyperlite All Weather Gloves - Men's
long_description: Make a call, send a text or choose the next set of tunes to listen to on your smartphone without freezing your fingers with the Seirus SoundTouch(TM) Hyperlite(TM) All Weather gloves. Thumbs and index fingers have a special material on them that lets you operate any touch-screen device without taking the gloves off. Water-resistant gloves are designed to fit snug for excellent dexterity. Wicking lining is comfortable next to skin and it helps move moisture. Polyurethane palms ensure you have a good grip on your smartphone. Seirus SoundTouch(TM) Hyperlite(TM) All Weather gloves have spandex cuffs that keep cold air out.
